website_summaries.verdict: A single-serving capsule that will gently cleanse your entire intestinal tract without causing any discomfort.
pros: One bottle contains enough for 2 15-day cleanses
Gentle cleanser that won't cause cramps or sudden bowel movements
Helps to reduce bloating and gastrointestinal distress
cons: A few users said that these supplements didn't produce results as quickly as they were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Best Colon Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I found the Best Colon cleanse exceeded my expectations! I've taken 2 capsules a day for the past week. I have found that they gently cleanse without the harsh effects (cramping) that some colons cleanse promise, but don't work as promised. I would highly recommend this product. I've also loss 2 pounds while staying on my regular diet! Doesn't get much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: lori l fermenick

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 days of using this, I have noticed a marked improvement in my body. After 6 days so far, my pants are looser and I have no belly bloat. I didn't change my diet because I wanted to see if this product worked. It does! I no longer have cramping and gas pains either. I highly recommend this!.
customer_reviews.author: D A R

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to buy the product first since I've never heard of the company. But this is my third bottle and it works wonderfully every time. Guaranteed! I will use it every 6 to 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bossa Nova Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This natural colon cleanse works for me. After taking it for 15 days and doing my best to watch what i ingest, keeping my food intake as healthy as possible and drinking lots of water, my insides always feels better. Definitely the main staple to the detox i do every three months.
customer_reviews.author: Ade

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father who is always struggling with constipation and GI issues. He's tried everything under the book to deal with this and nothing has seemed to work as well as this. He used the colon cleanse as described on the package and sure enough he found relief. He also managed to loose about 7-8 pounds in the process which was an added bonus. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked one day and then Zip, if anything did ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked one day and then Zip, if anything did the opposite of what a flush is supposed to do. Used it for 5 days and threw the remaining product in the trash, don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn T

customer_reviews.title: my stomach hurts so very bad everytime i take this
customer_reviews.text: I cant take it anymore....my stomach hurts so very bad everytime i take this....it is not a gentle pill it is a full blown dollar store laxative. Very very bad cramps for hours. I cant this pill and i am trashinh righttttttt N O W.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: It is gentle and it works great
customer_reviews.text: I consider it a very good product. It is gentle and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Good, gentle cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Good product and results. Mild cleanse, no side effects. Ordered it twice and will likely use again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I would really recommend that you take the suggested dose and I really ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really loving this cleanse! It has been very effective with me and I have even lost 3 lbs in the few weeks I have been using it! I would really recommend that you take the suggested dose and I really think you will find it very effective as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: I used only 4 days after I had a bir stomach ache. I stopped after that , It might work ,

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I just started taking these and I can feel the difference already! Great supplement to weight loss! Will buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great seller
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I seen results fairly quick. I will certainly buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It works and it's easy on your stomach. Definitely would buy it again!

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommend this, 2 stars for fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed anything different, this is my first cleanse, I dont recommend this, 2 stars for fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Seacow

customer_reviews.title: The King of Healthy Cleansers
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many, many colon cleansers. This brand has no competitors. It is simply great. The first day the response was minimal. I tolk another pill the second night and I wondered how I could function with all that poison inside me. I tool my third pill and the response again was minimal, then without taking a pill the 4th night, the effects of the pill taken the third day kicked in and I never realized how much gunk was clogging up the pipes. I will not be without this product, after taking for only 4 days I feel lighter and more important healther. IMHO not only helps with weigh loss but results in more energized feeling. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Healer

customer_reviews.title: This product caused stomach cramping for my husband. He ...
customer_reviews.text: This product caused stomach cramping for my husband. He didn't finish the bottle. This may work for some, just not him.
customer_reviews.author: Tig1017

customer_reviews.title: Effective product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been taking it for about a week now, I've got another week to go. It started working right away. I've never had constipation problems, I just thought maybe a thorough cleaning of my pipes was probably in order. First thing in the morning for the first 3 days or so I had to "go" 3 or so times. I would plan on maybe starting on the weekend. It definitely works for me. No cramping..
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE B.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle & it works
customer_reviews.text: So far product works as described, on 2nd day if using it. I take it at bedtime, no cramps, no sudden urges to go to the bathroom...the most gentle I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser was gentle and effective. I was afraid I would have cramps as I have experienced with other cleansers but that was not the case. My stomach felt less bloated and was more flat. If you are looking for an effective and gentle cleanser, I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Okoth

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product! One pill at night was enough for me and did not have any cramping etc. I think it's important with a product like this to also eAt lots of fruits and veggies and drink lots of water. I think when people experience cramping with it, it may be because they need more fiber and wAter. It's a great addition to cleansing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy TN

customer_reviews.title: Very Good & Effective Colon Cleanse
customer_reviews.text: This colon cleanse works very well. There are so many out there and I have tried many over the years. This brand did not cause any stomach pain or other side effects that I experienced with others.
customer_reviews.author: Kev72

customer_reviews.title: Works well except for tummy ache
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a huge stomach ache about midway between taking it and it going to work. But it does work, all cleaned out ;)
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Klasen

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: Made my stomach hurt cramping as well did not support weight loss and no less bloating for me guess it varies to the individual very dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: Dionna Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got these a few days ago and so far so good, will post update when I finish the bottle
customer_reviews.author: BCG

customer_reviews.title: so many of the foods that I love now irritate my stomach
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a gentle and effective way to cleanse your body, this is the product you have to try. I've developed some irritating food allergies as I've gotten older, so many of the foods that I love now irritate my stomach. Sadly it's trial and error to see what I'm allergic to, and sometime I go overboard on eating before I realize a new found food allergy.The Living Well 15-Day Natural Cleanse helps to clear my body of the food allergens without gas, bloat, indigestion or any of the other unpleasant side-effects you might think would accompany a cleansing product. I highly recommend you give this a try. It made a world of difference for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Reviews I read were deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: it recommends 1-2 before bed with 8 oz of water, but one pill for the first few nights did nothing and two gives me horrible cramps. Woke up with cramps in the middle of the night and have had cramps all day and can't really eat anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Poor results
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Have used products like this before and had great results. After 3 days very little results. Lot of cramping and gas. You would be better off with Duralax or Miralax. Advise, the weight you loose doing this will come right back when you return to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Bob54

customer_reviews.title: Stay close to bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I took it every night for 6 days now. Stay close to bathroom all day!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren puskas

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel "cleansed" after using it
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as some other cleanse products that I have tried. I had some bowel movements using this product, but too much and not every day (rather every other day at best). I don't feel like it did much, unfortunately. I still gave it a 3 though because I can't say that it did nothing. Plus, I may not have used it exactly as I was supposed to. The directions say to take one pill at night with an 8oz glass of water. I didn't always drink the 8oz and I continued to eat / snack after I took the pill (I'm a big nighttime snacker). I don't know if this affected how the product was supposed to work?
customer_reviews.author: ha

customer_reviews.title: I have tried a lot of products and so far this one has left me feeling much better. My stomach is less bloated
customer_reviews.text: This product really works!! I have had digestive problems for many years. I have tried a lot of products and so far this one has left me feeling much better. My stomach is less bloated, I don't feel full all of the time and there were no serious side effects. I will definitely use this product again and will be suggesting it to my family and friends. **I did receive this product at a discounted rate for my truthful and unbiased opinion**
customer_reviews.author: JC Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is actually 30 tablets, so you can do two cycles!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Girlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is the second type of colon cleansing pills that I've tried. These worked within 12 hours. Compared to some from Dr Tobias that took 2 days to kick in.. I took 2 at night and the following morning... well yea you know.. anyways, they definitely have helped me with losing a couple of pounds and also helped with bloating. It's only been 4 days and so far I haven't noticed any change in energy but I'm hoping by the time I get closer to the 15 day mark that my energy levels will increase. Disclaimer: I received this product at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: ******FIVE STARS....THIS WORKS MAGIC*******
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. It made me get rid of lbs of waste that my lazy digestive tract had problems clearing. Took about 2 days to kick in. Will definitely buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: AkK_121

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice increased energy and clarity, but it is an awesome cleanse! I didn't take it for 15 days in a row because I would occasionally forget, but now I just take it when I think about it and the next day it cleans me out. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Holdaway

customer_reviews.title: Try it you should like it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 3 days. It works without cramps. I think this is a good product for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Williamson

customer_reviews.title: then I was fine. I can feel I was much lighter when ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Hurts for first day, then I was fine. I can feel I was much lighter when I took this.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy B.

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: this does seem to work. when it takes over, be near a restroom

product_meta.title: Living Well Now 15 Day Natural Colon Cleanse Detox Supplement to Improved Intestinal Health
product_meta.description:
INCREASES ENERGY & CONCENTRATION

Allows energy from the intestines to place focus elsewhere, improving energy. Nutrition is very important to mental health, and the weak vitamin absorption before your colon cleanse may lead to loss of concentration. In addition to you having more energy, absorption of crucial vitamins responsible for mental clarity is improved, meaning your concentration may also be supported.



Living Well Now 15 Day Natural Cleanse is the best colon detox on the market! With additives in our food, pesticides on our crops, and pollution all around us. When your colon is backed up with toxic material, your body becomes sluggish and unable to perform optimally. Some toxins remain in the body and require some help to facilitate removal. Benefits of using a colon cleanse:

1-SUPPORTS COLON HEALTHToxins taken into your body will be processed, making it to the colon. By not cleansing your colon (and liver), causing damage. By ridding the body of the waste, you support the many functions of your colon, including digestion and proliferation of beneficial gut flora.

2-WEIGHT LOSSLow-fiber and processed foods lead to poor diet choices. It’s very hard to relieve yourself of low-fiber foods compared with high-fiber options, and these foods will often linger much longer in the gut. A colon cleanse flushes this matter from the system, and, in some, may lead to significant weight loss that stays off.

3-IMPROVES DIGESTION & PREVENTS CONSTIPATIONThis can make for poor digestion, and vice versa. When digestion is impaired and constipation ensues, waste products can linger in your body. Detoxing your colon allows those undigested waste products to be pushed through your system, providing constipation relief. This purge clears the way for good nutrient absorption, thereby supporting good health.

Must Try these Colon Cleanse Capsules Today!
feature_bullets: QUICKLY FLUSH TOXINS and FEEL BETTER: Provides results within 12 to 24 hours in terms of helping rid the intestinal tract of excess waste, reduce bloating, help increase energy and may provide several pounds of weight loss within a few days. Living Well Now 15 Day Natural Cleanse gently flushes your system to eliminate toxins/waste and helps to restore "good" bacteria in your colon and gut, which promotes better health.

ALL NATURAL & SAFE Colon Cleansing: A Total Advanced Complex blend of 100% Pure Natural ingredients, like Psyllium Husk, Cascara Sagrada, Senna Leaf, Flaxseed & Aloe Vera Gel. While Gently Cleansing the Digestive Tract It Aids in Digestion & Cleans the Gut.

COLON CLEANSE WEIGHT LOSS: If taken in the form of a 15 Day Regimen , you can Detox your Body, and Shed those Unwanted Pounds. Use this cleanse along with a Dietary and Exercise Program, and help Flatten your Tummy as well.
This Gentle Herbal Cleanser works great for Men and Women.
